refnamediv.refpurpose: Discard any pending updates to the SESAM database

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: sesam_rollback discards any pending updates to the database. Also affected are result cursors and result descriptors.
At the end of each script, and as part of the sesam_disconnect function, an implied sesam_rollback is executed, discarding any pending changes to the database.
